There's some people outside.

People?
God!

- Dad, hurry up! - Yeah, I'm going, honey.

Okay, honey, let's see what the fuss is all about.

Bud!

of picking the next President of the United States?

captions.sentence: The situation has changed. Your orders are out of date.
captions.chinese: 情况变了  你的命令已经过时了

captions.sentence: I'm a cop, like you, and I'm walking out there.
captions.chinese: 我和你一样也是警察  我现在就走过去

captions.sentence: Please do not shoot me!
Shoot at his feet.
Nothing like a little air superiority.
captions.chinese: 掌握制空权的感觉最好了

captions.sentence: Detective! Please stop! Please, detective! Stop!
captions.chinese: 警探  请你站住  快停下

captions.sentence: Stop walking! Blow it! Do it!
You have to get that bomb here. You've got 10 minutes.
captions.chinese: 你们必须把炸弹转移过来  还有10分钟时间

captions.sentence: They're pushing us to the entrance of the reactor.
captions.chinese: 他们想逼我们开进反应堆入口

captions.sentence: They're gonna try to reconnect the core.
captions.chinese: 他们想把炸弹放回反应堆

captions.sentence: You idiots!
You sons of bitches! You're killing us!
captions.chinese: 你个混蛋  你害死了我们所有人

captions.sentence: Yeah, follow your orders!
captions.chinese: 只知道服从命令的混蛋

captions.sentence: All right, boys. Get in a circle. Bow your heads.
captions.chinese: 好了  孩子们  围成圈  低下头

captions.sentence: It's on my side.
Hey, Father! Let's get everyone back on the bus, okay?
captions.chinese: 神父  大家都回到车上去  好吗

captions.sentence: Go, go, go! Back on the bus!
There's nowhere to go.
On the bus!
You've got to turn the truck east!
Stay straight!
Give me a hand! We can get a cable on it!
captions.chinese: 帮我一把  我们在上面绑根绳子

captions.sentence: Fox showed me how to override the reactor.
captions.chinese: 福克斯教过我怎么改写反应堆

captions.sentence: Oh, dear.
lncluding the emergency flood.
There's no way this bomb will be stopped.
captions.chinese: 现在不可能阻止炸弹爆炸了

captions.sentence: What are you doing?
Protection from the blast.
captions.chinese: 保护他们免受炸弹冲击

captions.sentence: We're gonna be all right!
It's an atom bomb!
Think they need to hear that?
Let them die without hope? Come on!
captions.chinese: 你想让他们绝望地死去吗  来吧

captions.sentence: Prepare yourselves.
My father's work is done.
-What are you doing? -I can get it out over the bay!
captions.chinese: -你干什么  -我能把炸弹运到海上去

captions.sentence: Set it to fly out over the water, then eject?
captions.chinese: 设置好飞到海上空然后抛射吗

captions.sentence: No autopilot.
You could've gone anywhere,
been anything. But you came back here.
captions.chinese: 做任何事  但你偏偏选择回来

captions.sentence: So did you.
I guess we're both suckers.
-I never cared who you were. -And you were right.
captions.chinese: -我从不在乎你是谁  -那就对了

captions.sentence: Shouldn't the people know the hero who saved them?
captions.chinese: 但人们应该知道拯救了他们的英雄是谁

captions.sentence: A hero can be anyone.
Even a man doing something as simple and reassuring as
captions.chinese: 即使那个人做的事是那么简单

captions.sentence: putting a coat around a young boy's shoulders
captions.chinese: 他为一个小男孩披上一件外套

captions.sentence: to let him know the world hadn't ended.
captions.chinese: 告诉他这不是世界末日

captions.sentence: Bruce Wayne?
Come on! There you go! Okay, you too.
Come on, Father.
Hey, heads down! This is it!
-No. -No, that's Batman!
That's detonation!
It's out over the bay! Clear of the city!
captions.chinese: 炸弹在海上爆炸  城市安全了

captions.sentence: "I see a beautiful city
and a brilliant people rising from this abyss.
captions.chinese: 升起一座美丽的城市  一个卓越的民族

captions.sentence: I see the lives for which I lay down my life
captions.chinese: 我看到我为之献身的人们

captions.sentence: peaceful useful, prosperous and happy.
captions.chinese: 过着宁静有益  富裕幸福的生活

captions.sentence: I see that I hold a sanctuary in their hearts
captions.chinese: 我看到  在他们心中

captions.sentence: and in the hearts of their descendants
captions.chinese: 在他们世世代代的子孙心中

captions.sentence: generations hence.
captions.chinese: 我始终占有神圣的一席之地

captions.sentence: It is a far, far better thing that I do
captions.chinese: 我现在做的  是我一生中

captions.sentence: than I have ever done.
captions.chinese: 做过的最好  最最好的事情

captions.sentence: It is a far, far better rest that I go to
captions.chinese: 我即将得到的  是我一生中

captions.sentence: than I have ever known."
captions.chinese: 得到过的最安宁  最最安宁的休息

captions.sentence: I'm so sorry.
I failed you.
You trusted me
and I failed you.
Can I change your mind
about quitting the force?
You know what you said about structures becoming shackles?
captions.chinese: 你说过  制度会成为枷锁

captions.sentence: You were right, and I can't take it. The injustice.
captions.chinese: 你说得没错  我无法接受这样的不公正

captions.sentence: I mean, no one's ever gonna know who saved an entire city.
captions.chinese: 没人知道是谁拯救了这座城市

captions.sentence: They know.
It was the Batman.
Mr. Wayne's will was not amended
to reflect his more modest estate.
captions.chinese: 涉及他宅邸的部分  将不做修改

captions.sentence: Nonetheless, there are considerable assets to dispose of.
captions.chinese: 尽管如此  它们依然是相当昂贵的资产

captions.sentence: The contents of the house are to be sold
to settle the estate's accounts
and the remainder is left
in its entirety to Alfred J. Pennyworth.
captions.chinese: 则归管家  阿尔弗雷德·J·佩尼沃斯所有

captions.sentence: The house and grounds are left to the city of Gotham
captions.chinese: 房屋和土地权归哥谭市所有

captions.sentence: on condition that they never be demolished, altered
captions.chinese: 而条件是不得拆除和变更用途

captions.sentence: or otherwise interfered with
and that they shall be used for one purpose, and one purpose only:
captions.chinese: 它们将被用作  并只能被用作

captions.sentence: The housing and care of the city's at-risk and orphaned children.
captions.chinese: 城市紧急避难所和孤儿院

captions.sentence: My clerk can help with
the smaller correspondences and instructions.
Blake, John.
-Nothing here. -Uh, try my legal name.
captions.chinese: -没有记录  -好吧  那试试我的真名

captions.sentence: You should use your full name. I like that name.
captions.chinese: 你应该用你的真名  那名字很好听

captions.sentence: -Robin. -Thanks.
Why worry about the stabilization software?
captions.chinese: 何必再担心稳定性软件

captions.sentence: This entire autopilot system's completely obsolete.
captions.chinese: 这个自驾系统已经淘汰了

captions.sentence: Please, I just need to know what I could've done to fix it.
captions.chinese: 拜托  我只想知道怎么才能把它修好

captions.sentence: But, Mr. Fox,
it's already been fixed. Software patch.
captions.chinese: 自驾系统软件已经修好了

captions.sentence: Six months ago.
Check the ID on the patch.
Bruce Wayne.

captions.chinese: -遗失物品方面有消息吗  -还没有

captions.sentence: They better leave no stone unturned.
captions.chinese: 最好不要落下什么东西

captions.sentence: We can't leave a string of pearls on the manifest as lost.
captions.chinese: 我们不能将那串珍珠项链列为遗失物品
